name: Worms City Attack Pro
description: It’s time to threaten the world; Play as a deadly earth creature; take control of the mind-boggling underground monster in this endless terror of Worm’s City Attack. Destroy everything, blow up jeeps and tanks, bring down helicopters and kill everyone coming in your way. The object of this fast-paced game is to feed yourself with humans, animals or can say everything on the earth. The game features unforgettable classic animations and easy controls to move the creature in any direction. Nobody knows who is he? As a player you are not going to save the animals and human beings. Just have fun don’t be stress, you are not a hero; you are the villain of the game. Do some warm up, for few levels no one will kill you. No power-ups! You have to do all strategically.
